arts.ttl: Johan Bakayoko strikes early as RB Leipzig secure fourth straight win at Wolfsburg
arts.sum: RB Leipzig are on a charge up the Bundesliga standings after Johan Bakayoko's early strike against Wolfsburg extended Die Roten Bullen's winning streak to four straight matches. Keen to avoid going an 11th home match without a win in Germany's top flight, meanwhile, Wolfsburg started brightly, with Mohamed Amoura testing Péter Gulácsi in the opening minute.

arts.ttl: Leipzig hang on in Wolfsburg as Bakayoko's strike separates the sides
arts.sum: A Johan Bakayoko goal in the first seven minutes ensured another big win for Leipzig on a 1-0 shoreline.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg vs. RB Leipzig preview: Visitors looking to extend winning streak
arts.sum: VfL Wolfsburg host an in-form RB Leipzig side on Saturday afternoon, with the visitors arriving on the back of three straight wins.

Wolfsburg were unable to produce a response to Karim Adeyemi's 20th-minute goal last weekend, suffering a narrow away defeat to Borussia Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park. Paul Simonis' side are now winle...
